#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Introduction =

Currently the Primary Controller is a standard Laptop running Ubuntu 12.04 and ROS Fuerte.  In the future the Primary Controller will be a ODroid-X2.

= Configuration =
 * SBC: ArchLinux, ROS-Groovy
 * Laptop: Ubuntu 12.04, ROS-Fuerte
 * Ethernet IP Address:  10.7.44.119 
 * Wlan IP Address:  10.7.45.158
